page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: We have been attending Raeburn Primary School for seven years as we are nearly all fourth years. We have charity weeks,trips and holidays and a resource area. Once a year we have a charities fortnight were we make up and play games.We sell crisps and cakes.We make about Â£200 and we give half to a little girl in Malaysia and the other half to charities. This year we have been on a number of visits to farms,Barnston Dale,museums,Hilbre Island and York. In school we have a resource area in which we do cooking,claywork,woodwork and sewing.Every class goes into the resource area once a week. Everybody in our class enjoys cooking.We have been making bread recently.
